long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A basic calculator extension for browsers.

Perform calculations effortlessly with this intuitive calculator Chrome extension. You can use your keyboard for quick calculations too. Simply press 'Space' to clear, 'Backspace' or 'Delete' to delete the last digit, and 'Enter' or '=' to calculate. It supports basic operations (+, -, *, /), percentage (%), and even toggles between positive and negative numbers. Streamline your math tasks with this user-friendly calculator extension.
